DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot clinical trial study well computer-based behavior change guide work increase physical activity patient prostate cancer receive androgen deprivation therapy . A computer-based behavior change guide website may increase physical activity level prostate cancer survivor help doctor understand outcomes related become physically active important patient prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Computer-Based Behavior Change Guide Increasing Physical Activity Patients With Prostate Cancer Who Have Received Androgen Deprivation Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Engage prostate cancer patient ( PCPs ) receive currently androgen deprivation therapy ( ADT ) develop computer-based behavior change guide ( BCG ) PCPs provide fundamental information benefit exercise individual capability goal provide personalized physical activity plan . ( Development Phase ) II . Engage PCPs understand outcome important related become active ( e.g. , help manage side-effects treatment , reduce fatigue ) develop measure evaluate patient-centered outcome . ( Development Phase ) III . Evaluate BCG study compare personalize computer-based BCG physical activity recommendation provide via passive website ( American Cancer Society Guidelines Nutrition Physical Activity Cancer Survivors ) among PCPs receive ADT . ( Evaluation Phase ) OUTLINE : DEVELOPMENT PHASE : Patients view mock-ups BCG web design computer , iPad , print color paper provide feedback one-on-one interview separately use think/talk aloud method follow one-on-one interview . After completion design round , patient use BCG website provide individual feedback . EVALUATION PHASE : Patients randomize 1 2 group . GROUP I : Patients use BCG website collect personal information include individual health priorities/goals , demographic ( i.e . age , ethnicity ) , health information ( i.e . weight , height , cancer history , health condition ) , individual capability , physical activity level , exercise preference . Patients receive report personalize physical activity plan . GROUP II : Patients use passive website ( American Cancer Society Guidelines Nutrition Physical Activity Cancer Survivors ) . After completion study , patient follow 2 month .
DOC.criteria: Prostate cancer ( PCa ) diagnosis Able read English computer screen Signed Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve informed consent EVALUATION PHASE Underactive ( define physically active less 30 minute per day few 2 day per week ) Access computer home public location NonEnglish speaking subject exclude study ; website develop available English
